channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Can You Keep It Up For A Week?
channel.desc: Comedy. Annette will marry Gil, her hapless boyfriend, on the condition he keeps his new job for a week without getting up to mischief with other women. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Die Screaming Marianne
channel.desc: Marianne, a nightclub dancer, is on the run from vicious criminals. Trickery and betrayal are around every corner in this suspense-filled thriller. Susan George stars.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Weekend Millionaires
channel.desc: An oral history of Britain's most famous river; focusing on the Lightermen and Watermen who have worked on the Thames from the 1960s to today.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Telford to design a cat-friendly, enchanted garden for Lesley and her beloved moggy Gizmo.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Home and Garden
channel.desc: Alan is in Chester to meet retirees Richard and Ann, who have been married for 34 years.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: It is March, and Ruth Goodman, Alex Langlands and Peter Ginn greet the long-awaited arrival of spring. It is time to bring in the daffodil harvest.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country Show Cook Off
channel.desc: Jun Tanaka and Galton Blackiston arrive in the north Devon fishing village of Clovelly, where they take on the locals in the Clovelly crab and lobster festival.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: A World Without Dwarfism?
channel.desc: Ellie Simmonds investigates a controversial new drug that promises to help children with dwarfism grow closer to average height. If it can prevent dwarfism, should we embrace it.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Stuart Farm
channel.desc: 1 / 12. Five archaeologists and historians run a farm for a year as it would have been in 1620. The team use oxen to plough, sow seeds by hand and prepare a Jacobean feast.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Hello Campers
channel.desc: Relive the glory days of good clean Hi-De-Hi style fun with this oral history of Britain's holiday camps. Hello Campers.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Floating Home
channel.desc: In Surrey, Linda and Mark need an upgrade on their cramped floating home and Linda's doing it by herself. Is passion enough to get the job done.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: LumoTV
channel.desc: In this new family episode, teams consist of a child and an adult competing for ?1,000. Will we see a family feud as these teams face five challenging games.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Queer Lives Today
channel.desc: Tom Gaisford's film follows a gay trans man stepping into the ring for a boxing fight. This knockout documentary gives you a ringside seat to a situation gaining notoriety.

channel.title: Love Your Home and Garden
channel.desc: Alan is in Chester to meet retirees Richard and Ann, who have been married for 34 years.

channel.title: Highclere

channel.title: LumoTV
channel.desc: In this new family episode, teams consist of a child and an adult competing for ?1,000. Will we see a family feud as these teams face five challenging games.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Queer Lives Today
channel.desc: Shiva Raichandani's film follows Asifa as she prepares to undergo gender affirmation surgery. The trans activist reflects on how her life has changed during her transition.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Girls Come First
channel.desc: Portrait artist Alan Street is employed by the Soho Swingers Club to paint the hostesses. Whilst he relishes his new job his girlfriend is less than impressed. Contains nudity.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Mary Millington
channel.desc: A detective film set in seventies London's seedy porn trade. A serial killer is targeting women who all appeared in the magazine Playbirds. Contains adult scenes.

channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Lee head to Southampton to conjure Michelle's garden up into a tropical paradise - the perfect space to relax with friends and family - all for ?6,000.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Home and Garden
channel.desc: Alan Titchmarsh and the team help a 15-year-old boy confined to his wheelchair who has become increasingly confined to his house and cannot access the garden.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: It's April and the fishing season has arrived. Alex and Peter go to sea in an Edwardian trawler. Ruth stays ashore and prepares potted shrimp.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Country Show Cook Off
channel.desc: Jun Tanaka and Galton Blackiston enter the home baking section of the Henley Show. They also visit Tamsin Borlase whose organic farm supplies local restaurants.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Battle of Britain - Empty Skies
channel.desc: Interviews with 19 men and women who were part of the Battle of Britain - unique accounts of the parts they played in the nation's defence, in their own words.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Stuart Farm
channel.desc: 2 / 12. Month two, and with the weather on the turn, the team need to build a cowshed to shelter their livestock over winter, using only tools and materials available from the time.

channel.desc: In Kent, metal worker John tackles a cut-price riverboat restoration using ingenious workarounds. Can he make a home of his own.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Highclere
channel.desc: The castle marks the release of the second Downton Abbey film with an interview on the Lorraine breakfast show and a trip to London's Leicester Square for the premiere.
